WATCH: Tucker Carlson Challenges Black Professor on White Privilege 
“When the left doesn’t have any other arguments, they go and just accuse everyone of being a racist,” Cruz said. “It’s an ugly, ugly part of the modern Democratic Party.” 
“Jeff Sessions is an honorable, decent person,” he continued, pointing out that the false charges Warren was recounting on the Senate floor had already been extensively covered in Judiciary Committee hearings. 
“I’ll point out that the Democrats are the party of the Ku Klux Klan. You look at the most racist people, you look at the Dixiecrats, they were Democrats who imposed segregation, imposed Jim Crow laws, who founded the Klan,” explained Cruz. “The Klan was founded by a great many Democrats, and yet now the Democrats just accuse anyone they disagree with of being a racist.” Advertisement - story continues below 
“That was a false smear of Jeff Sessions, and I think he’s gonna make an extraordinary attorney general,” Cruz added. “After eight years we deserve an attorney general who’ll be faithful to the law and faithful to the Constitution.”

Granted, Cruz did get his history a little bit tangled up: The Dixiecrats were a segregationist Democrat breakaway group in 1948, while the Klan dates from the Reconstruction period. Birds of a feather, but not of the same vintage. Advertisement - story continues below
